actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Ousterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library, and certain units of local government.

summary.text: Relieves any local government unit or specified libraries in Pennsylvania from liability for erroneous U.S. contributions for disaster relief activities.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Ousterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library, and certain units of local government.
